---
title: "My presentation template"
subtitle: "and its subtitle"


author:
  - name: Pierre Galmiche
    affiliation: 
      - Looking for opportunities

date-format: "MM/DD/YYYY"
date: 01/01/2025

bibliography: references.bib
format:
  revealjs:
    preview-links: true
    margin: 0.0
    min-scale: 0.5
    max-scale: 1.2
    template-partials:
      - title-slide.html
    title-block-style: plain
    title-slide-attributes:
        data-state: "hide-menubar"
        data-background-image: ./images/MLMS_team.jpg
        data-background-size: contain
        data-background-opacity: "0.5"
    center: true
    incremental: true
    theme: [moon, ./css/custom.scss]
    slide-number: "c/t"
    navigation-mode: linear
    transition: slide
    transition-speed: slow
    auto-animate-easing: ease-in-out
    auto-animate-unmatched: false
    auto-animate-duration: 0.8
    background-transition: fade
    controls-layout: bottom-right
    menu: true
    css: "css/style.css"
    section-divs: false
    # logo: images/logos/ICube.png 
    simplemenu:
      barhtml:
          header: "<div class='menubar'><ul class='menu'></ul></div>"
          footer: "<div class='slide-number'></div>"
      scale: 1
    appearance:
      hideagain: true
      delay: 300
      appearevent: 'slidetransitionend'
      autoappear: false
      autoelements: false
      appearparents: false
    pointer:
      alwaysVisible: false
      pointerSize: 18
      color: 'red'
      key: "p"
    excalidraw:
      button: false
      shortcut: "x"
    webcam: 
      toggleKey: "c"
      enabled: false 
      persistent: false

revealjs-plugins:
  - simplemenu
  - appearance
  - pointer
  - excalidraw
  - webcam
---
